CustomField.description:
Used to determine which page to load when next button is clicked. Assume the following example: Current navigation flow status : CRCRR Current page is the second page.
If this field value is 'Required' then clicking next button will skip page 3 since it already completed and will load page 4. If this field value is 'Completed' then clicking next button will load page 3.
If 'Required' then next action will load the next required page. If the immediate next page is already completed then it will be skipped.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Used to determine which page to load when next button is clicked. Assume the following example: Current navigation flow status : CRCRR Current page is the second page.
If value is 'Required' then next button will skip page 3 and will load page 4.
CustomField.label: Next Action Go To Page
